definitions.definition: the first meal of the day

examples.text: They were having breakfast when I arrived.
Do you want bacon and eggs for breakfast?
Julianne was sitting in the **breakfast room**, calmly sipping a cup of tea.
He's in the kitchen cooking us breakfast.
Why don't we have breakfast in bed?
Low-fat cheeses and yogurt are good breakfast foods.
Would you clear away the breakfast things?
I always have a cooked breakfast.
I'm going to have a nice leisurely breakfast tomorrow.
She was sitting at the breakfast table, buttering her bread.

definitions.definition: a thing that has been done badly

examples.text: He's made a real dog's breakfast of these accounts.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from the verb break + the verb fast.
